question:
BAHASA INDONESIA    1. Kalimat majemuk dalam teks ulasan dibagi menjadi dua salah satunya adalah...
a. kalimat majemuk setara
b. kalimat majemuk bertingkat
c. kalimat penghubung
d. kalimat kompleks​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Yaitu, kalimat majemuk yang polanya tidak sederajat (bertingkat). ... teknik membaca yang dianggap sebagai salah satu teknik membaca

related_questions.question:
Arrange the words into good sentence

tolong di jawab 
​

My New Backpack    I have a new backpack. Its color is soft green. I
always bring it when I go to school. It is made of strong
fabric. There are several parts of my backpack. The first
part is the pocket. I put my money and my library card
in the pocket. The second part is the main part. I put my
books and pencil case in this part. The third part is a
small pocket on the left side of the backpack. I keep a
bottle of water in this pocket.
1. How many parts of the writer's backpack?
2. What is the function of the main part of the backpack?
3. blue - He-pale-has-eyes - skin - and
1 2 3 4
4 5
5 6 7
nac these sentences into the correct order.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1.three parts

2.to put his books and pencil case

3.he has blue eyes and pale skin

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu

Jawaban:

1. four [ 4 ]

2.in pocket I can put my money and my library card.

the second is i can also put a pencil and book holder

and the last thing is that I can put a water bottle in the side pocket

3. [ sorry nomor tiga aku ga tau jawaban nya ]

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu, Semangat belajar nya

related_questions.question: Contoh percakapan 5 orang tentang borrowing a book the library

answers.answer:
andi : hi guys , how are you ? , have you guys prepared for tomorrow’s lesson

marsya : hi andi , we’re good , what lesson?

andi : it’s english lesson mr. thomas will be teaching us tomorrow but i lost my book

sari : “ oh my god i forgot tomorrow will be the most important lesson , if we dont bring the book mr. thomas will get mad at us “

tono : “ guys relaxx .. we have library in our school “

joey : “ yeah .. that’s right you guys no need to worry mrs . milla will help us to find the book “

andi : “ thank god , i thought our school doesn’t provide us that kind of book we wanted “

marsya : “ well ... let’s go to library then before its close “

andi : “ alright “

related_questions.question: Tuliskan 10 kata kerja dalam bahasa inggris dan artinya dalam bahasa indonesia

answers.answer:
Jawaban:Fishing memancing, drawing menggambar, reading membaca, writting menulis, taken mengambil , Singing menyanyi,Study belajar , Eating makan , Walking berjalan, Climbing memanjat

Penjelasan:

Jawaban:

1. Read artinya Membaca.

2. Write artinya Menulis.

3. Speak artinya Berbicara.

4. Cook artinya Memasak.

5. Sing artinya Menyanyi.

6. Bring artinya Membawa.

7. See artinya Melihat.

8. Punch artinya Memukul.

9. Stand artinya Berdiri.

10. Sit artinya Duduk.

Semoga membantu ^_^

related_questions.question: Kk tolong di jawab sekarang ya mks btuanya​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

B. Hibernate

Penjelasan:

Karena Artinya Beruang tidur di musim dingin. Jadi jawabannya Hibernasi (B)

related_questions.question: They are watching tv now and they??a.will watchb.wathcc.going to watchd.are whatced

My name is Arja. This is my family. Tonight, all the members    of the family ... (15) in
the livingroom. (16) a sport magazine. My sister, Arsy ... (17) bear doll
. My
mother (18) her tea My Daddy ... (19) hot chocolate into his cup.


15. a. is gathering
 b. are gathering
 c. gather
 d. gathered

16. a. read
 b. reading
 c. is reading
 d. am reading

17. a. play
 b. plays
 c. played
 d. is playing

18. a. enjoy
 b. enjoys
 c. is enjoing
 d. am enjoying

19. a. am pouring
 b. is pouring
 c. are pouring
 d. poured
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

15. B. Are Gathering

16. D. Am Reading ( di soal tidak ada penjelasan siapa )

17. D. Is Playing

18. C. Is Enjoying

19. B. Is Pouring

Penjelasan:

Semoga Membantu

jadikan jawaban terbaik ya

Jawaban:

15. A

16. D

17. D

18. B

19. B

Penjelasan:

maaf kalau salah
